name: Saving Grandma' !
description:
Save grandma' from death by taking her to the fountain of youth !

This game was made for the Ludum Dare #46

Please, put the game in fullscreen ! 

There may be a bug where you can't go on the next level, probably because an enemy passed through the floor (it happen yes), just restart the game, sorry for this!

Controls

Move : WASD / Left Joystick

Sword Attack : LB Mouse / X

Pistol Attack : RB Mouse / Y

Jump : Space / A

(Grandma forgot to implement controller inputs, sorry!)

Tools

Unity 2019

Aseprite

Piskel

Reaper
